scripts.build: shx rm -rf dist && node scripts/update-git-commit.js && rollup --config rollup.config.ts --configPlugin typescript && shx cp src/rollup/types.d.ts dist/rollup.d.ts && shx chmod a+x dist/bin/rollup
scripts.build:cjs: shx rm -rf dist && rollup --config rollup.config.ts --configPlugin typescript --configTest && shx cp src/rollup/types.d.ts dist/rollup.d.ts && shx chmod a+x dist/bin/rollup
scripts.build:bootstrap: node dist/bin/rollup --config rollup.config.ts --configPlugin typescript && shx cp src/rollup/types.d.ts dist/rollup.d.ts && shx chmod a+x dist/bin/rollup && cp -r dist browser/
scripts.ci:test: npm run build:cjs && npm run build:bootstrap && npm run test:all
scripts.ci:test:only: npm run build:cjs && npm run build:bootstrap && npm run test:only
scripts.ci:coverage: npm run build:cjs && npm run build:bootstrap && nyc --reporter lcovonly mocha
scripts.prepublishOnly: git pull --ff-only && npm ci && npm run lint:nofix && npm run security && npm run build:bootstrap && npm run test:all
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run test:all
scripts.test:cjs: npm run build:cjs && npm run test:only
scripts.test:all: npm run test:only && npm run test:browser && npm run test:typescript && npm run test:leak && npm run test:package
scripts.test:coverage: npm run build:cjs && shx rm -rf coverage/* && nyc --reporter html mocha test/test.js
scripts.test:coverage:browser: npm run build && shx rm -rf coverage/* && nyc mocha test/browser/index.js
scripts.test:typescript: shx rm -rf test/typescript/dist && shx cp -r dist test/typescript/ && tsc --noEmit -p test/typescript && tsc --noEmit
